subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: New Orleans played more than four quarters without holding a lead, until Garrett Hartley kicked an 18-yard field goal 6:29 into overtime for a 33-30 win.
snippet: New Orleans played more than four quarters without holding a lead, until Garrett Hartley kicked an 18-yard field goal 6:29 into overtime for a 33-30 win.
